summary: The course covers a comprehensive range of topics related to cloud architecture using AWS. It includes modules on introducing cloud architecting, adding storage, compute, and database layers, creating networking environments, connecting networks, securing user and application access, implementing elasticity, high availability, and monitoring, automating architecture, caching content, building decoupled architectures, and microservices and serverless architectures. The course also prepares participants for disaster planning and certification bridging. It is a hybrid course offered by אוניברסיטת בר אילן, with sessions available both on-campus and via Zoom. Prerequisites include AWS Practitioner certification or equivalent knowledge.
full_text:
COURSE NAME: AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate

COURSE OVERVIEW: The course is designed to provide comprehensive knowledge and skills in cloud architecting using AWS. Participants will learn to design and implement scalable, secure, and highly available systems on AWS.

PREREQUISITES: Participants should have AWS Practitioner certification or equivalent knowledge.

COURSE SCHEDULE: 
- Start Date: 01.11.2024
- Duration: 20 sessions
- Academic Hours: 100
- Schedule: Tuesdays from 17:30 to 21:30 and Fridays from 09:00 to 13:00

LEARNING FORMAT: The course is hybrid, offering the flexibility to attend classes either on-campus at Bar-Ilan University in Ramat Gan or via Zoom.

COURSE TOPICS: 
- Welcome to AWS Academy Cloud Architecting
- Introducing Cloud Architecting
- Adding a Storage Layer
- Adding a Compute Layer
- Adding a Database Layer
- Creating a Networking Environment
- Connecting Networks
- Securing User and Application Access
- Implementing Elasticity, High Availability, and Monitoring
- Automating Your Architecture
- Caching Content
- Building Decoupled Architectures
- Building Microservices and Serverless Architectures
- Planning for Disaster
- Bridging to Certification

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION: 
- To schedule an admission interview and registration, contact Esther Asulin at 052-5886002 or email esther.asulin@biu.ac.il.

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION: The course is offered by the School of High-Tech and Cyber at Bar-Ilan University, inviting participants to join the advanced certification in the cloud domain.
